avahi4j
Interface IRecordBrowserCallback

public interface IRecordBrowserCallback

Classes implementing this interface receive notifications from RecordBrowser objects when records for a given host have been retrieved.

Author:
gilles

Method Summary
 void recordBrowserCallback(RecordBrowser browser, int interfaceNum, Avahi4JConstants.Protocol proto, Avahi4JConstants.BrowserEvent event, java.lang.String name, Avahi4JConstants.DNS_Class clazz, Avahi4JConstants.DNS_RRType type, byte[] rdata, int lookupResultFlags)
          This method is called when the records for a host are available.
 

Method Detail

recordBrowserCallback

void recordBrowserCallback(RecordBrowser browser,
                           int interfaceNum,
                           Avahi4JConstants.Protocol proto,
                           Avahi4JConstants.BrowserEvent event,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           Avahi4JConstants.DNS_Class clazz,
                           Avahi4JConstants.DNS_RRType type,
                           byte[] rdata,
                           int lookupResultFlags)
This method is called when the records for a host are available. The record's details are given to this method as arguments.

Parameters:
browser - the RecordBrowser object calling this method.
interfaceNum - the interface number the host is registered on
proto - the protocol
event - the event associated with this record. If Avahi4JConstants.BrowserEvent.FAILURE is received, all the other fields are meaningless.
name - the hostname
clazz - the RR class
type - the RR type
rdata - the record's data
lookupResultFlags - the lookup result flag LOOKUP_RESULT_* (See Avahi4JConstants)
